amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for taxpayer services at IRS by $10 million and reduces funding for enforcement at IRS by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for taxpayer services at IRS by $10 million and to reduce funding for enforcement at IRS by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roskam amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 338 - 80 (Roll no. 410).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roskam amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 338 - 80 (Roll no. 410).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Roskam.
